alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 9:14PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pasco, north central Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 914 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keystone, or 7 miles east of New Port Richey, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, New Port Richey, Lutz, Hudson, Holiday, New Port Richey East, Beacon Square, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Jasmine Estates, Citrus Park, Greater Carrollwood, Lake Magdalene, Trinity, Odessa, Jay B Starkey Wilderness Park, Bayonet Point, Town N Country and Cheval. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
